Trigger.Name: Mitigation - Aura [Keep Disabled]
Trigger.Description: Key: $1 - Caster ID - Used for Party Order & Name $2 - Ability Name - Used for Icons and Sounds $3 - Duration - Used to determine active/inactive $4 - Cooldown - Used to determine when to remove $5 - Player Order - Used to determine Table Lookup & Y Positioning $6 - Table Order - Used to determine Table Lookup & X Positioning
